name: Twin Stones: The Journey of Bukka
storyline: After the disappearance of the mystical gem of destruction, the world has fallen into deep chaos. The last hope of restoring order lies in the hands of a young hunter who, in the middle of an inhospitable nature that threatens to devour everything, has been chosen by a strange jewel that will guide him through an unexpected and challenging adventure.
summary: Twins Stones: The Journey of Bukka is a challenging 3D platformer. Driven by a lineal-based levels, you'll explore through a forest, Mount Kinui, the city of Darmah in ruins, and the God's Temple, with simple mechanics and precise movement.
